title: VW/Porsche parts I would like gone by 26 July -see pics

posts.content:
WHEELS

PORSCHE TELEDIALS

Set of 4 Porsche teledials, all 6J ET 52.3. V.Clean condition complete with Porsche alloy centre caps. Tyres are 205/60/15 directional 91V tyres with 5-6mm tread left. £180/with centre caps £165/without centre caps (won't sell caps on their own so please don't ask)



PORSCHE DESIGN 90

Just one spare 6J design 90, 52.3ET, no tyre £50



NSU RO80 FUCH



NSU RO80 Alloy wheels. These were only supplied in one size and are 14" 5.5J, they have a very good offset, see pic



Set FIVE NSU RO80 baby 'Fuch' (14" 5.5J) Good condition with centre caps. £225

1 Spare NSU RO80 baby 'Fuch' (14" 5.5J) Good condition with centre cap £50

1 Spare NSU RO80 baby 'Fuch' (14" 5.5J) Good condition but some small marks to edge no centre cap £30

I also have a set of as new (23mm thick, steel) 112 Bay/T25 adaptors to run Porsche wheels. 112PCD > 130PCD adaptors. These will only be sold with either of the above Teledials / NSU Fuchs for an additional £100 I WILL NOT SELL SEPERATELY SO PLEASE DON'T ASK



RONAL

1 Set 5 Ronal 112PCD wheels. 14” 6J, came off a late bay so do fit. No tyres. Come with brand new (sealed on bag) nuts/washer, no centre caps. A very rare wheel and very cool. £180






1 set of 4 golf IV steel wheels with hubcaps, all fitted with FIRESTONE F580 FUEL SAVER TYRES 175/80/14 as original supplied from factory. Tyres are all good and have @5mm tread, no rips/tears
£30



Stock wide 5 bus rims (14" 5.5J) x2. £5ea or £6 pair

BRAKES / SUSPENSION

SPLITSCREEN IRS KIT

IRS Kit for splitty. DC Code IRS box (4.125), full late bay rear set up. Comes with some new parts, need to cut springplates to late bay dims (comes a spare set of splitty springplates -use late bay ones supplied for template). This needs to be used with 112>205 adaptors OR new Creative Engineering 205PCD rear drums. Driveshafts include with bay & bug CV’s, A arm fixing, nuts and bolts. New backing plates required (29.99 from GSF). £265





PORSCHE

Porsche 944 (early) front hubs etc. [SOLD]


Porsche 944 early spindles -. £30



Set of 10 Porsche ali nuts £10



944 rear caliper £15 (NSR)



VW CALIPERS

Golf Mk4 Rear calipers. Very good condition, free pistons / sliders with usable disks and pads. £50



Golf Mk3 Front and Rear calipers including pads. Very good condition, free pistons / sliders. Front pads as new (just been changed before being removed from car) and rear pads 50-75% worn.
£60 set or will £45 fronts / £30 rears



Lucas rear calipers off a 1000mile old 307. Very clean as almost new, same type as Golf rears, come with new pads. Also bought for a rear disc converison that never happened.
£45

BAYWINDOW BUS

New repro slash cut rear bumper. Not perfect, has some very light surface rust as has been stripped but very honest. £60



Genuine Hella early bay Near Side indicator lense in VGC £16



Early bay side door handles £5ea



Late 002 bay belhousing. Can run T1 1600 engine through to T4 and WBX lumps. £30



Late bay wiper motor £10
Late bay rear engine mount hangers £10 pair



NOS genuine 1200 van exhaust £65



Baywindow (early bay) spare wheel cover, small crack on one end £12



NEW late bay shocks (set of 4) F+R £40 (cost £65)



JK Interior light, new boxed £12 (cost £19)
NOS Hella accessory switch for bay or 67 bug £22


1600 Van Exhaust, as new, was only used a few miles before getting a stainless 4into1 £25



Alternator stand, don't think it has ever been fitted £10

BEETLE

Type 1 / Type 3 rear stub axles (pair) complete with bearing spacers. £30



Type 1 / Type 3 68> rear brake backing plates, brake shoes / springs etc. Good solid condition. £10



NOS 67 only bug winder handle £18 [Sold to BLD]



Genuine VW NOS OSR wing for a 68-73 beetle.
Could very easily be used on a earlier beetle if you want to re-shape the bumper iron slot and drill new light holes. Good quality genuine part that is hard to come by. Part number 111 821 306L
£95





65> beetle indicator. Excellent chrome £12.50 [Sold to BLD]



Beetle locking shifter. Good used condition £25



Beetle bumper mounts, £5 pair



NOS Hella accessory switch for bay or 67 bug £22

GENERAL

Late KG indicator lense, VGC £14



NOS Lumax light £15



Grab handles £1ea except bug dash grab handle £3, 1200 bug door handle £2 and bay deluxe £4



T4 radio blanking plates £4ea
New genuine Quantum HT leads for a T25 WBX. £15
New golf Mk1 water hose £1



Oil cooler. Cleaned and flushed ready for use. £14



T3 ears, very solid, just a light covering of surface rust £5pr




52mm 12V chrome bezel Motometer clock (tested working) £20
Mk1 golf/passat VW chrome wheel centres, set of 5 in VGC £20



Small parts

From 50p for the clips to £15 for the NOS 12V clocks (tested working)



New 1200/1500 SP vac can £15

12 blower fans, both tested working
12V blower as fitted to T4 engined busses. £25 (right hand in pic)
12V blower from T1 or T4 £25 (left hand in pic)




Fuel regulator (adjustable chrome pancake style) £8
T3 interior light £5

TINWARE

T1 twinport tinware.

Set of Tinware comprising of….
Fanhousing (doghouse) with the 2 rear pieces
Font tin over exhaust and matching tin for behind pulley wheel
Rear Tin at gearbox end
Pair TP head tins
Pair small tins that sit exhaust box side of head tins
Flaps, link bar and thermostat + holder
The 3 piece under engine tin set
3 piece alt / gen backing plates
Nice set complete with flaps and thermostat £75 or without flaps/stat £60




Twin port tin, huge box of with approximately 2 sets of tin in good usable condition but not quite as good as the complete set above. £60 (most tin pictured below but another small box is also included)





T1 TP heads, 91mm opening (1300?). Bare £45



040 head, Genuine VW, bought as NOS £95



111 905 205T SP Vacume advance distributor. Very very clean, no excess play in either axis on shaft, earth strap A1. Also have a new vacume can to go with this (nowt wrong with one on it but the new one is new and erm...shiney)

Dizzy £32, new van £15 (both for £45)



Genuine VW hubcaps, orginal and not perfect. Not desperate to sell but if you want them PM me

Hi

Could you tell me how much to post the 12v starter please. (Live near Gloucester)
Also can you confirm that it works?

Thanks
Martin
I'd like the 944 Hubs/Disks (not struts thanks) if you can post them (presumably about £10 extra??)?
how much for the engine mount hangers...posted please

maddison wrote:
how much for the engine mount hangers...posted please


Post is what ever Royal mail want -probably £7 as they ain't light

bobley wrote:
I'd like the 944 Hubs/Disks (not struts thanks) if you can post them (presumably about £10 extra??)?


Post is probably £14 as they are rather heavy. Can only get these shipped by Courier Friday so if you want them I would need payment sorted for them.

MartT wrote:
Hi
Could you tell me how much to post the 12v starter please. (Live near Gloucester)
Also can you confirm that it works?
Thanks
Martin


Post would be £10 via courier (Friday only) or £13 via Royal mail (as above if for Friday would need payment sorted) Will test again tonight as haven't tried for a few months

Hi,

Is there any chance of courier for the IRS kit?

Roger

MartT wrote:
Hi

Could you tell me how much to post the 12v starter please. (Live near Gloucester)
Also can you confirm that it works?

Thanks
Martin


Martin, starter turns over very well which just goes to show should should never judge a book by its cover

rogc wrote:
Hi,

Is there any chance of courier for the IRS kit?

Roger


Roger, if you are serious then work out the courier cost using interparcel/send it now or similar and as long as you sort payment out by Wednesday then why not. Can only get this couriered FRIDAY so have a think. Just had a quick look and think as 2 parcels maybe £35 / £40

Matt,

Sorry but unfortunately we go away this weekend. I will have to pass on the IRS kit for now, I'll have look when we get back mid August and if yours is still for sale I will email you.

Roger

Matt

I'll take the starter please. (£20 + £10 courier = £30)
How do you want paying?

Cheers
Martin

Porsche 944 fronts sold, 12V starter also sold subject to payment.

Thanks guys for buying the above but does anyone want the big stuff like wheels, tyres, tinware....I would love the space
